IX.iii.1.A.6.f
.
Example:  Discontinuance of Award After Receipt of Non-Recurring Income
Situation
:  A Veteran receives a one-time payment of income on August 7, 2019.  The amount of the payment causes the Veteran’s income to exceed the MAPR.  The award is discontinued effective September 1, 2019.
Result
:  The earliest effective date for a new award is September 1, 2020, with a payment date of October 1, 2020.
title: M21-1, Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A - General Information on the Effect Income and Net Worth Have on Pension and Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
citation: Part IX, Subpart iii, Chapter 1, Section A
